text: Charles E. Toole (January 5, 1922 – June 23, 2008) was an American football coach. He served as the head coach at Loras College in Dubuque, Iowa from 1955 to 1957. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1922 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Boston College Eagles football players Category:Loras Duhawks football coaches Category:Sportspeople from Boston Category:Players of American football from Massachusetts
title: Charles Toole
